org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays
Class ItemizedOverlayWithBubble<Item extends org.osmdroid.views.overlay.OverlayItem>

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay
      org.osmdroid.views.overlay.ItemizedOverlay<Item>
          org.osmdroid.views.overlay.ItemizedIconOverlay<Item>
              org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.ItemizedOverlayWithBubble<Item>
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay.Snappable, org.osmdroid.views.util.constants.OverlayConstants
Deprecated. now use Marker instead. 

@Deprecated
public class ItemizedOverlayWithBubble<Item extends org.osmdroid.views.overlay.OverlayItem>
extends org.osmdroid.views.overlay.ItemizedIconOverlay<Item>

A collection of icons placed at particular points on the map's surface. When the user taps on an icon, an InfoWindow or "bubble" will open and display item attributes.
Items must be ExtendedOverlayItem.

Author:
M.Kergall
See Also:
ExtendedOverlayItem, InfoWindow

showBubbleOnItem

public void showBubbleOnItem(int index,
                             org.osmdroid.views.MapView mapView,
                             boolean panIntoView)
Deprecated. 
Opens the bubble on the item. For each ItemizedOverlay, only one bubble is opened at a time. If you want more bubbles opened simultaneously, use many ItemizedOverlays.

Parameters:
index - of the overlay item to show
mapView -
panIntoView - true if you want the map view to be centered on it.

Deprecated. 
Close the bubble (if it's opened).

the item currently showing the bubble, or null if none.
